about_the_game:
In They Remain embark on a harrowing journey of survival in a post-apocalyptic world overrun by the undead. In this massively multiplayer online game, band together with other survivors to scavenge for resources across the wildlands, fortify and upgrade your base, and fend off relentless hordes of zombies. Will you thrive amidst the chaos or succumb to the ever-present threat of those who remain?



SURVIVE AT ALL COSTS


  • Choose your battles wisely. Death is permanent there is no coming back.
  • Survive against those who remain, Survive against the living.
  • Collect valuable loot.
  • Death comes for us all. How long will you survive?

    DISCOVER THE HARSH REALITY OF THE WILDLANDS


  • Explore All Corners Of the wildlands.
  • Enter the city for high risk and high reward or explore its surrounding farmlands
  • Find useful resources you can take back to the settlement for money or upgrades.

    BUILD A NEW WORLD


  • Join a new settlement at the bottom of the ranks and work your way up to the top
  • Trade items in your settlement to further your growth
  • Upgrade your settlement with different areas, Kitchens, Allotments, infirmary's to help you survive this harsh world.
  • Defend your base from hordes of zombies
  • Manage your base's survivors to ensure its running at peak performance

content_descriptors.notes:
They Remain is a zombie game with Mature Content Elements that are not suitable for younger audiences, due to the graphic and intense nature of the game.

Some of the mature themes players should be aware of before purchasing They Remain:
Violence and Gore
Horror Themes
Language
Themes of Survival
Dark Storylines
Online Interactions

We at Therris Studios believe it is important to be transparent with our audience so they can make informed decisions about whether this game is suitable for them.  Additionally, players should always exercise discretion and consider their own comfort levels when engaging with mature content in video games.

  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
